description: Try our easy to follow Fruity Thirst Quenchers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fruity Thirst Quenchers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place ice into glasses. Add clear apple juice and top with lemonade or soda water. For decoration, make some melon balls (we used rockmelon and watermelon) and thread onto skewers, topping with a slice of your choice of fruit. Add to glasses and finish with a party parasol.
